channel.title: Need help making commands (can't find thred)
channel.description:
sorry i am a real noob trying to learn stuff im trying to make a new command for the client i am useing Whip Lash soruce i can seem to find away to add them i gess its in the client .java but i cant seem to make it work if any one could help would be happy
just to add item to characters bag or to kick a player its for gm's only thanks

item.title: Need help making commands (can't find thred)
item.dc:creator: @billynom8s billynom8s
item.description:
@billynom8s wrote:

i looked for it in the client ? its not there sorry
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 08, 2009, 11:07:44 am[/size][hr]for some reson when i in put the code that darking gave me it would not compile ? im realy sorry to be a bother[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 08, 2009, 11:12:57 am[/size][hr]its ok i feel so dumb i think ive solved it xx thanks for the help guys nice and help full forum u guys run

Read full topic

item.title: Need help making commands (can't find thred)
item.dc:creator: @Darkning Darkning
item.description:
@Darkning wrote:

well it is a deltascape base source,

if (command.startsWith("kick") && playerRights > 0) { client noob = null; for(int i = 0; i < server.playerHandler.players.length; i++){ if(server.playerHandler.players[i] != null){ if(command.substring(5).equalsIgnoreCase(server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName)){ noob = (client)server.playerHandler.players[i]; noob.disconnected = true; noob.logoutButton = true; } } } }

try that for the kick command

Read full topic

In your client class, find your customCommand method and start a command as below.

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("command")) { // Whatever the command performs goes here }
